entry.title: HOUSE PASSES BILL REPEALING WILDFIRE MAPS
entry.summary: June 25, 2025 3:50 a.m. On Tuesday, the Oregon House of Representatives passed Senate Bill 83, which will repeal the Statewide Wildfire Hazard Map.
